ex: 网络 交通管理系统(Advanced Traffic Management Systems)；先进交通管理系统；自动柜员机
n. 设置；机构；组织；调整；计划；装备
eg2: This completes the setup of queues.
这就完成了队列的设置。
If the  from the previous sections succeeded, then handshake should succeed as well.
如果前面几节中的设置成功了，那么握手在这里也应该会成功。
We can therefore perform all of the setup work on each dispatcher, only to have just one dispatcher actually succeed in delivering the message.
因此我们可以在每个调度程序上执行所有的设置工作，而实际上只让一个调度程序继续传递消息。

wp.Inno Setup: 安装制作工具;安装制作软件;安装包制作;安装包制作工具

wp.display setup: 显示设置;显示设备设置;显示设定;显示安装程序
wp.setup time: 准备时间;		建立时间;设置时间;安装时间
wp.Security Setup: 安全设置;安全体系;安全配置
wp.custom setup: 自定义设置;自订安装;定制安装;自定义安装
wp.Setup Factory: 安装工厂;安装程序制作工具;已解决;制作安装程序帮助手册
wp.Unattended Setup: 自动安装;无人值守安装;无人参与安装

ex: 网络 查找子窗口；查找子句柄；查找子视窗

title: Access to banking services is spreading throughout the developing world
content: Access to banking services is spreading throughout the developing world People are increasingly relying on mobile apps, rather than physical banks IN 2017 the number of people without access to banking services fell to 1. down from 2. in 2011, thanks largely to the rise of mobile-payment apps. Physical banks and ATMs can be expensive to setup, especially in rural areas, but the rise of mobile banking has meant that for the first time, hundreds of millions of people living in the developing world now have access to finance. According to the Findex, an index compiled by the World Bank, only 69% of adults around the world have bank or mobile-money accounts. But 78% of wage-earners without bank accounts have mobile phones. So mobile-payment services should have plenty of room for further growth.
